Title: WPFMVVM Sample Application
Description:
Provide a sample WPF MVVM application. covers basic MVVM implementation.
Show how easy to write a unit-test methods.
HomeWiki:
Here's a simple WPF application using MVVM(Model View ViewModel) architecture.

MVVM provides us with lots of benefits. One of the most known benefits is writing unit-test for the business logic/ViewModel.

Separation of Xaml view/ ViewModel /Model allow more than one developer to work on the screen. 

The requirements are very simple. Create a master detail application.

The master screen displays a list of employee names.

user can select a name from the list and click edit button to display details screen.

Details screen allows user to update selected employee's name and age.

Name field doesn't allow special characters.

Age field allows numbers only.
